review:
5k+ hours in Overwatch 1 & 2 and I promise you - there is not a game company that despises its own player-base as much as new Blizzard, and they’ve said this many times. 

Built from an era of true gamers with a love for creating worlds, environments and games that could envelop and feed the soul, AB is a hollow and blood-sucking company, draining every last drop of what these games used to be. 

Very few (if any) of the original developers and adored members work at Blizzard anymore, they’ve slowly dropped like flies at the disdain for the company and what it’s done to the players all in the name of greed and money. Seeing their passion projects gutted like this must break their hearts. 

A true testament to this, is knowingly selling a remake/remodel of Overwatch solely for the aspect of PVE, weather and (many more) different maps and then SCRAPPING ALL OF IT, without so much as offering their players a refund. Many suspect they never intended to even go through with it to begin with. 

-Next, some of the skins you would pay 15-20$+ for today were FREE in Overwatch 1. 
-They revolve their meta around overpowered pay-to-win characters and whatever they’re selling during that months BP. 
-They hid ways to see players time and hours put in the game as to not deter new players, completely diminishing your efforts for new $$$.
-AB has scammed E-sports teams millions of dollars for their roster position then completely scrapped that project, too. 
-They oftentimes don't offer their dedicated streamers first looks or beta keys, their PR team offers random YouTubers and streamers keys who've never even played the game, further disrespecting their own community. 

This is cheap money-making machine with an IV attached to its player’s wallets. They don’t care about you in the slightest, and the gameplay has obviously suffered because of this greatly: it’s simply not a fun or rewarding experience when metas revolve around shareholders. 

There are a thousand more reasons to avoid this game and company entirely but I hope that if they thought tapping into the Steam revenue with more DLCs would be fruitful for them, they’re sorely disappointed, as we have always been. 

Save yourself a lot of misery and just -- don’t.

I write this as a warning to all who think of spending there hard earned money and pressure time on this dumpster fire of empty promises and a company with MANY criminal allegations. I played the original Overwatch back in 2016 and it was some of the most fun I have had back then I look back on that time spent fondly. I was really excited when this "new" game was announced pre-covid, I never could have imagined how hard they would have fallen. This new game (if you can even call it that) was built with the promise of an extensive story mode and proceeded to not update its previous version for 3 years. All we did get was way more monetization options, a battle pass (god I'm sick of those), MORE FOMO, and a half baked remnant of what we could have gotten with the promised story mode. The "story" we are getting is purely to make up for the dev time to pay the share holders. This "game" is a disgrace to what Overwatch was, go spend your money on something else and more importantly don't what your precious time on this disgrace of modern gaming.
Imagine sending all the Sniper bots on a migration to Overwatch.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game online a month ago, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

This game is fun for what it is by its skeleton (Overwatch 1), and I recommend for you to try the multiplayer. But I am soooooo dissapointed because of the fact that they falsley advertised the PvE. 

The PvE and actually spending any money on that game is not worth at all. It's just a big patch for Overwatch 1 but not a sequel, and it's baffeling how they charge you 15 euros for a barebone single player mode, that's very similar to how previous special singleplayer timed events worked in Overwatch 1, and those were free. 

Oh and expect to see bullshit in PvP too now that you need to unlock your heroes (most of them are easly unlockable by just completing matches fortunetly).

Reason for the Overwatch 2 development was the Pve mode with Pve-Skill-Tree for every Hero.
They cutted and slowed down the updates of Overwatch 1 for several years(if im right that started 2018/19), then OVerwatch 2(2022) came out, no News, nothing about the PROMISED PvE mode.
They changed the Lootboxes system(wich was awesome) to Skin-Paywall with Battlepass shit, plus "new" Heroes behind Battlepass aswell (need to unlock them in the battlepass, around Battlepass lv 40/50, so alot)

A few month ago they told us "Hey.. the promised PvE mode with the Skill Tree, well its not coming, but hey in august we´ve 3 pve missions that cost 15bucks and dont get hyped about more missions, cuz we dont know when new missions are coming"

Well.. f*** Y** Blizzard for promising us the mode we loved to have and for cutting out content in ow1 for nothing.
But hey.. they had time for the 3 Missions, the battlepass system and the skin shop, but not for the skilltree and the real PvE Mode?!

I have played hundreds if not thousands of hours of Overwatch ever since the alpha. I'm sad to say that the Overwatch we have today is a husk of the game I fell in love with. It's clear that there are devs on the team that care for the game, but at the same time it's being choked by ABK management with weird monetization schemes that everyone hates along with cancelled updates and years with no updates prior to that. Now they are trying to keep the flames alive by adding half-finished content and trying to push unlocking heroes through hilariously broken battlepass and PVE updates that used to be free but now are ridiculously overpriced down the throats of their dwindling playerbase as if they need to milk the last bits out of the product before scrapping it. Yeah, just like they did with Starcraft 2, Heroes of the Storm and Hearthstone although I guess Hearthstone is still somewhat on life-support. I mean hell, they are even destroying Diablo 4 with broken battlepasses too before it has barely had a chance to get released.

ABK has turned into a greedy monster that doesn't care about players or entertainment the way Blizzard used to. Now it's producing FOMO nightmares instead. 
Steer clear of their games until Bobby Kotick doesn't have his greedy treasure goblin claws in the company anymore.

Promised PVE mode was false advertising. 
Furthermore Invasion missions are locked behind paywall. You can not even use premium in-game currency to access them.  
Premium battle-pass  does not contain enough premium currency to allow buying the next one in the following season. 
Overpriced skins [20$ per skin] for heroes locked behind paywall. 
Badly working matchmaking, forcing 50% win rate, sometimes even causing 10+ win/lose streaks.
Game balance favoring typical typical shooter gameplay with little effort given to teamplay, map knowledge or managing your abilities. 
Official forum is basically dead as devs do not listen to community feedback.
This game is a low effort attempt to milk as many $$$$ as possible.

Дорогой игрок. Если ты новичок в этой игре, то самое время прикоснуться. Ведь игра сейчас ожила новыми красками. Большинство игроков ноет, что игра не та и мертва, но всё что сейчас происходит в игре идёт ей только на пользу. Ведь подумай только, игра раньше была без обновлений 4 года. А сейчас постоянно выходят новые герои, карты, ивенты, скины. Игра преобразилась, стала динамичнее интереснее. Если ты новый игрок, то точно попробуй и поиграй в эту замечательную игру. P.S. играю с 2017го, мастер первого овервотча, гм во втором. Играй и наслаждайся ни смотря на нытиков.

Mano sério porquê chupar um pau é tão gostoso?
Tipo o simples formato dele é gostoso contornar com a língua... O sabor é gostoso, o melzinho que solta quando você da aquela sugada na pontinha que faz aquele elo transparente da glande até o seu sorriso de tesão... Ai ai ai... 

Só de escrever da água na boca.
Mas o melhor é a atmosfera que se cria... Aquela atmosfera de tesão onde só se ouve o barulho de molhado dentro da sua boca e os gemidos da pessoa que está recebendo o boquete,

Eu recomendo a todo homem hétero que nunca chupou o pau de um amigo, faça. Mané seu amigo na amizade. isso apenas fortalece a amizade de vocês e não impacta em nada na sua sexualidade. Chupar pau é uma coisa, sentir atração por homem é outra completamente diferente...
